attributes.action: Provide the vaccine to nursery workers and teachers as a matter of urgency.
attributes.background: I would like the government to provide the vaccine for covid 19 to teachers and nursery workers. These are key workers and have kept the country’s education going all the way through the pandemic. These people deserve the vaccine as aster of urgency alongside nurses and healthcare professionals.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554316
